custom:hook.name: custom:hook
custom:hook.description: Runs a passthrough for your handlers. Otherwise does nothing.

name.name: name
name.description: The name of your hook for your own purposes.

option1.name: option1
option1.description: Arbitrary value for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string

option2.name: option2
option2.description: Arbitrary for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string

option3.name: option3
option3.description: Arbitrary for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string

option4.name: option4
option4.description: Arbitrary for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string

option5.name: option5
option5.description: Arbitrary for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string

multi1.name: multi1
multi1.description: Arbitrary array for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string[]

multi2.name: multi2
multi2.description: Arbitrary array for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string[]

multi3.name: multi3
multi3.description: Arbitrary array for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string[]

multi4.name: multi4
multi4.description: Arbitrary array for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string[]

multi5.name: multi5
multi5.description: Arbitrary array for your custom hook to recognize. Type is string[]

flag1.name: flag1
flag1.description: Arbitrary on/off flag for your custom hook to use. Type is boolean

flag2.name: flag2
flag2.description: Arbitrary on/off flag for your custom hook to use. Type is boolean

flag3.name: flag3
flag3.description: Arbitrary on/off flag for your custom hook to use. Type is boolean

flag4.name: flag4
flag4.description: Arbitrary on/off flag for your custom hook to use. Type is boolean

flag5.name: flag5
flag5.description: Arbitrary on/off flag for your custom hook to use. Type is boolean

account:setup.name: account:setup
account:setup.description: Sets up an account to use with SuiteCloud SDK and configures the default auth ID for the SuiteCloud project. This command requires browser-based login to NetSuite.

dev.name: dev
dev.description: It only needs to be specified if you want to use a customized NetSuite domain.
